articles.title: Transfer deadline day shock as Atletico Madrid welcome back Antoine Griezmann - IOL
articles.description: It has been an extraordinary transfer window in Europe, with Lionel Messi departing Barcelona for Paris and Cristiano Ronaldo’s sensational return to Manchester United.
articles.content:
PARIS - France forward Antoine Griezmann has made a shock return to Atletico Madrid just two years after leaving to join Barcelona, on the final day of a hectic European transfer window.

articles.title: Qld seeks to preserve Indigenous languages - The West Australian
articles.description: The Queensland government hopes an ongoing grants program will help preserve and revive traditional languages, with two thirds lost since European settlement.
articles.content:
Before European settlement, more than 150 different languages were spoken by Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islanders across Queensland.
Today, about 50 remain and fewer than 20 are used as first lang… [+1794 chars]
